item.title: John Malone, Neal Mohan, Phil Spencer, Hiroki Totoki, Strauss Zelnick and Mellody Hobson Set for Paley Center’s International Council Summit
item.description: Media and tech heavyweights including John Malone, YouTube’s Neal Mohan, Microsoft’s Phil Spencer, Take-Two’s Strauss Zelnick, Sony’s Hiroki Totoki and investors Mellody Hobson
